Class Arena

java.lang.Object
com.shiroyama.chess2.arena.Arena
public class Arena extends Object
Represents the combat area where the pieces fight each other. Manages combat state, Projectile and interactions between the two pieces.

  • Constructor Details

    • Arena

      public Arena(PieceInfo attacker, PieceInfo defender)
      Constructor for the arena class.
      Parameters:
      attacker - the piece which initiated the start of the combat
      defender - the piece which got attacked

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(float deltaTime)
      Updates the arena state, including projectile movements and combat logic.
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the time elapsed since the last update

    • startCombat

      public void startCombat()
      Starts the combat between the attacker and defender.

    • isCombatOver

      public boolean isCombatOver()
      Checks if the combat is over.
      Returns:
      true if the combat is over, false otherwise

    • attackerWon

      public boolean attackerWon()
      Check if the attacking piece won.
      Returns:
      true if the attacker won, false otherwise

    • getProjectiles

      public List<Projectile> getProjectiles()
      Gets the list of active Projectile.
      Returns:
      a list containing the active projectiles

      public PieceInfo getAttacker()
      Gets the attacking piece.
